ai.summary: Cornerstone Walk is a gentle 1.8 km stroll in the UK, located in an unspecified region. Ideal for families and casual walkers, it features flat terrain and light scenery suitable for a relaxed outing.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat with a few gentle sections. Surfaces are a mix of compacted earth, gravel, and occasional paved strips. Paths are generally well maintained, but watch for uneven patches or roots.
ai.safety_notes: Suitable for most ages and abilities. Wear comfortable shoes and weather-appropriate clothing. Stay on marked paths, be mindful of other pedestrians and cyclists, and observe any street crossings near parks. In wet or icy conditions, surfaces can be slippery; adjust pace accordingly.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn generally offer the best weather and daylight for this 1.8 km walk. It is also workable in milder winter days with appropriate gear.
